Site Download is a versatile and powerful Chrome extension that simplifies the process of downloading files and websites directly from the omnibar. With just a simple command, you can download any file or website HTML without the need for additional steps or tools. If your query isn't starting with the word download, your search will be redirected to Yahoo.com.

How It Works:
1. Easy to Use: Simply type the word download followed by the target URL in the omnibar.
2. Smart Detection: The extension automatically checks if a valid URL follows the download keyword.
3. Versatile Downloads: Whether it's a document, image, video, or the HTML of a webpage, this extension can handle it all.

Features:
Seamless Integration: Works directly from the omnibar, no need to open new tabs or use third-party services.
Wide Compatibility: Supports downloading of all file types and website HTML.
Fast and Efficient: Quickly processes your download request to save you time and effort.
User-Friendly: Intuitive and straightforward design for an enhanced user experience.

Why Choose Download Anything?
Convenience: Downloading files and websites has never been easier. Just type and download.
Flexibility: Perfect for students, researchers, and professionals who need to save online resources effortlessly.
Reliability: Trust that your downloads will be handled efficiently and securely.

Add Site Download to your Chrome browser today and take control of your downloading experience. Simplify your workflow and save time with this must-have extension!

For questions or support, email us at info@site-download.live.
To uninstall the extension, follow the instructions at https://site-download.live/#faq
